pacman.game.ai.agents

Enum GhostState

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<GhostState>
      • pacman.game.ai.agents.GhostState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.ai.fsm.State<GhostAgent>, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<GhostState>

    public enum GhostState
extends java.lang.Enum<GhostState>
implements com.badlogic.gdx.ai.fsm.State<GhostAgent>
    Class with the states in which the ghost can be in. (Movements like up down left right, states like running away or pursuing).
